OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: This IP performs async asset to quote flow.
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: ESM_AsyncAssetToQuote

omniProcessElements.name: GetAssetIdsToProcess
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "assetIds" : "%additionalData:AssetIds%", "existingAssetIds" : "%GetExistingAssetsFromQuoteLineItem:existingAssetIds%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction1", "remoteClass" : "B2BCmexAssetController", "remoteMethod" : "getFilteredAssetIdsToProcess", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: GetExistingAssetsFromQuoteLineItem
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "AssetIds" : "%additionalData:AssetIds%", "QuoteId" : "%additionalData:QuoteId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "bundle" : "GetExistingAssetsFromQuoteLineItem", "chainOnStep" : false, "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ ], "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "ignoreCache" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorTurboAction1", "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: sendNotificationFailedToStart
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "body" : "%SetUserId:asyncProcessName% has failed to start", "customNotificationTypeName" : "ESMNotifications", "targetID" : "%additionalData:QuoteId%", "title" : "Async assets to quote migration failed to start", "userID" : "= $Vlocity.UserId" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "disableChainable" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "%sendNotificationStartedStatus% == false", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "integrationProcedureKey" : "ESM_SendAppNotification", "label" : "IntegrationProcedureAction3", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: sendNotificationStarted
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "body" : "The selected assets are being added to the quote %additionalData:QuoteId%. We'll notify you when it's complete.", "customNotificationTypeName" : "ESMNotifications", "targetID" : "%additionalData:QuoteId%", "title" : "Adding assets in progress...", "userID" : "= $Vlocity.UserId" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "disableChainable" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "%StartAsyncJob:code% == 202", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "integrationProcedureKey" : "ESM_SendAppNotification", "label" : "IntegrationProcedureAction2", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: SetUserId
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "elementValueMap" : { "asyncProcessName" : "Async Asset to Quote for %additionalData:QuoteId%", "userID" : "= $Vlocity.UserId" }, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "label" : "SetValues2", "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "show" : null }

omniProcessElements.name: StartAsyncJob
